content: Do you know if the missing talks (1-02 .. 1-04 etc.) for Lang.NET 2008 will ever get posted? Or are they lost forever?
The website, http://langnetsymposium.com/2008/agenda.aspx says "video coming soon" for the missing talks. I've been waiting for these videos to "come" for what must be a year now :)

Ok, ok, I should have changed that text to "Coming only if someone helps". Those talks aren't lost forever, but the videos I have of them are each 7gb and I don't have the anything nearly powerful enough to compress them in a reasonable amount of time (need to get them down to approx 100mb). Expression Media decidied not to open them last time =)

If anyone wants to step up and help out, by all means let me know, but if not they will stay on this external hard-drive forever.
